Title: Adding a Data Source in the TimeXtender Desktop _ Community
Author: missing
Text: data source has been added in the TimeXtender Portal This guide describes how to add a newdata source on TimeXtender Desktop Tasks in an ODX Instance Warning: Data on demand Advanced Settings

Lists.heading: Adding a Data Source in TimeXtender Desktop
paragraphs: This guide describes how to add a new data source on TimeXtender Desktop

list: Select the Connection from available connections you have configured in TimeXtender Portal.

Lists.heading: On-Demand Data Warehouse Ingestion
paragraphs: When 'Data on demand' option is enabled (in TX Desktop Data Source > Advanced Settings), the data source will transfer data into ODX storage before the MDW ingests the data.  This will work without configuring an explicit "Transfer task" under the data source
list: Right-click on your data source > Edit
Check the box Data on demand
